name: Glass Smasher (LabRat54)
description:
Glass Smasher is a mobile puzzle game.

The aim of the game is to destroy the red glass while keeping the blue glass visible and safe on the platforms. After destroying all the red glass by tapping them a countdown will appear to make sure any blue glass is safe and sound on the platforms. There are currently 9 levels and feedback on the game is greatly appreciated.

I plan to release this game on the Google Play Store and IOS Appstore when I finish the game.
